text: Yuri Zhukov (born 1964), is a Russian ballet dancer. Zhukov trained at the Vaganova Academy of Russian Ballet in St. Petersburg, Russia. Zhukov was a soloist with the Kirov Ballet and a principal dancer with the San Francisco Ballet and the Birmingham Royal Ballet. In 2008, he founded Zhukov Dance Theatre, a contemporary dance company in San Francisco. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Russian male ballet dancers Category:Living people Category:San Francisco Ballet principal dancers Category:Birmingham Royal Ballet principal dancers Category:Mariinsky Ballet first soloists
title: Yuri Zhukov (dancer)
